'''"Mega-Mighty Boulder Breaker"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Mega-Mighty Boulder Breaker" is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Ameyalco Waters}} after defeating {{Enemy|Flowing Blade Skirmisher|x=2}}.

</gallery>
